title: Naked Attraction - Dating hautnah
overview: What does my body say about me? And how do I look like others if I can't hide behind stylish clothes and cool accessories? It seeks to discover exactly that, and begins where other dates end: naked! One bachelor and six candidates - the candidates are naked! They are presented in six boxes without lids and are revealed piece by piece. All the candidates have to convince themselves that the coveted single is their body because the face is only revealed at the end. What does the naked body say about personality and lifestyle?
